Articles.Content:
Just a simple suggestion, but RCS would be so much better if we could have thrust limiters like we have on regular engines. This would be especially useful for spaceplanes which often have limited RCS space around their center of mass.

What do you guys think?
I was making spaceplanes lately and thought exactly this.

the tweakable everything mod includes an RCS Thrust Limiter

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64711-1-0-TweakableEverything-1-11-6-For-all-your-part-tweaking-needs](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64711-1-0-TweakableEverything-1-11-6-For-all-your-part-tweaking-needs)
